entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
